function.name: array
function.help: Like the arrayNew function, the array function creates a new one dimensional array. The difference is you can immediately set the values of the created array by using this function. Example: array('string',1,array(1,2,3),now())

parameter.name: expression
parameter.help: A comma delimited list of array elements elements. eg: 'string',1,array(1,2,3),now()
